sourcesContent:
import React, {Fragment} from 'react'; export default function About (props) { return (

Download YouTube Shorts Video â€“ Online shorts video downloader

Shortsloader is an online tool which helps you to download or convert Youtube videos and YouTube Shorts videos in Mp4 video or Mp3 audio format. It's easy, free and fast tool by which you can download and save videos directly to your phone or computer.

We don't require any information for accessing our tool, so you don't need to worry about providing login credentials. Our services are totally free which can be used to download unlimited amount of Shorts videos. We provide one of the best YouTube shorts video downloader online services in simplest and easy way.

Key features:

  1. Shortsloader is the only web application which provides downloading youtube videos & shorts videos online in HD quality.
  2. Compatible with all devices, can be used to download videos on any device. i.e Phone, Tablet, iOS or PC.
  3. It is lifetime free service, we do not charge anything for our services. We might place some ads on it which supports maintenance of our services.
  4. Unlimited usage, our tool can be used to download unlimited youtube videos & shorts videos online.

How to Download YouTube Shorts Videos?

  • Step 1. Copy video link or URL.
  • Step 2. Paste the Link into the input field on Shortsloader.com
  • Step 3. Click the download button, after processing.
  • Step 4. Done! Download your YouTube Shorts Videos in Mp4 or Mp3.

How to copy YouTube Shorts Video Link??

  • Step 1. Open Shorts in YouTube.
  • Step 2. Click on share icon, located at bottom right corner.
  • Step 3. Now click on Copy Link.
  • Step 4. Your Shorts video URL/Link has been copied.

Where do the downloaded files get saved?

Files you've downloaded are automatically saved in the Downloads folder or the "download history" section on your device.

In what format we can download Shorts videos?

Using our tools you can download or convert Youtube Shorts Videos to Mp4 & YouTube Shorts to Mp3, we provide downloading shorts in both Audio Mp3 and in Video mp4 formats.

How to use Shortsloader.com ?

Using or web application is very simple, all you need to do is get the link of that particular youtube shorts video that you want to download or convert. After it, paste your link to the input box and hit download button, application will automatically convert videos and generate preview where you see buttons to download in mp4 video format as well as mp3 audio format.

 ) }
